complaint.description: Rain does not even deserve a star. They quick to deduct payment but up until now my wifi has not been working. They are not replying to mails and not phoning back. First of all payment was made on May 2, 2022. I only received my parcel on May 12, 2022. And up until now this wifi is giving problems switching off and on. Either they send the technician guys to sort this out or I want to be reimbursed asap.
complaint.suggestion: Either send the technician to fix the wifi issue or provide a reimbursement as soon as possible.

meta.review_content:
Rain does not even deserve a star.

They quick to deduct payment but up until now my wifi has not been working.. They are not replying to mails and bot phoning ng back.

First of all payment was made the 2nd May 2022.

I only received my parcel 12 May 2022

And up until now this wifi is giving problems switching off and on. Either they send the technician guys to sort this **** out or i want to be reimbursed asap.
